code: import React from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';import'./SpecificProduct.scss';import{Col,Container,Image,Row}from"react-bootstrap";import{addItem as _addItem,removeItem as _removeItem}from'../redux/cart/cart.actions';import{createStructuredSelector}from'reselect';import{selectCollections}from'../redux/shop/shop.selectors';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var twoDecimals=function twoDecimals(number){return parseFloat(number).toFixed(2);};var SpecificProduct=function SpecificProduct(_ref){var collections=_ref.collections,match=_ref.match,addItem=_ref.addItem;var result=collections.filter(function(product){return product.linkUrl===match.params.productId;})[0];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"product-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{xs:12,md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{fluid:true,src:result.imageUrl,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{xs:12,md:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"juice-title",children:result.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",twoDecimals(result.price)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:result.ingredients}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:result.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return addItem(result);},children:"Add to cart"})]})]})});};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{addItem:function addItem(item){return dispatch(_addItem(item));},removeItem:function removeItem(item){return dispatch(_removeItem(item));}};};var mapStateToProps=createStructuredSelector({collections:selectCollections});export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(SpecificProduct);
